channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Application Inspector
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Application Inspector

item.title: CVE-2020-0872|2024-08-04T06:18:03.557Z -- microsoft -- application%20inspector
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Application Inspector version v1.0.23 or earlier when the tool reflects example code snippets from third-party source files into its HTML output, aka 'Remote Code Execution Vulnerability in Application Inspector'.
